
                            
                            <p>客服不管，敷衍我怎么办，气的我骂人了，找他们3次了都不解决问题，难道他们不敢吗？活动2月底就结束了，那个小米手环又不能退款了，怎么办 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/15/180526c2sbmo0owt9c22ck.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/15/180526c2sbmo0owt9c22ck.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/15/180535gf677z8f0so800er.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/15/180535gf677z8f0so800er.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/15/180540dlyayajvdl40eloo.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/15/180540dlyayajvdl40eloo.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/15/180547c00iymlsysm0t6sm.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/15/180547c00iymlsysm0t6sm.jpg"> <br>  </p>
